answers.answer: that does sound like type two. i really think you should get an a1c done, which is a average blood sugar level of three months.hope that helps!

question: my daughter is turning 4years old now. i experienced a 10 pound weight gain after decrease in milk supply. this is accompanied by occasional headache, increased thirst, skin dryness and occasional abdominal pain with alternating soft stools and constipation. I also occasionally have leg cramps ( which is probably due to my thalassemia?). is this diabetes? i do have two paternal aunts with diabetes.
title: uncontrolled weight gain, increased thirst, headache
